meanings.definition: The time at which one typically goes to bed.
meanings.sent1: My mom always reminds me of my bedtimes.
meanings.sent2: Children have different bedtimes depending on their age.
meanings.sent3: I missed my bedtimes because I was too busy playing.
meanings.sent4: The city's bedtimes are early compared to the bustling nightlife in the town.
meanings.sent5: Setting regular bedtimes can improve sleep quality.

meanings.definition: The act of going to bed at a specific time.
meanings.sent1: Routine bedtimes help establish a healthy sleep pattern.
meanings.sent2: She follows her bedtimes strictly to ensure she gets enough rest.
meanings.sent3: His bedtimes are so early, he's practically asleep before dinner.
meanings.sent4: The soldier's bedtimes were dictated by the military schedule.
meanings.sent5: Missing bedtimes can lead to feeling tired the next day.
